snippet: Alpha Tau Omega revoked the charter and closed its Indiana University chapter Thursday after the release of a video suspected of showing a fraternity member performing a sex act on a woman.
lead_paragraph: Alpha Tau Omega revoked the charter and closed its Indiana University chapter Thursday after the release of a video suspected of showing a fraternity member performing a sex act on a woman.

headline.print_headline: Indiana: Fraternity Closed After Vulgar Video Surfaces
headline.main: Indiana: Fraternity Closed After Vulgar Video Surfaces
